title: Hypothesis-Driven Simulation Education for Problem-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical operations and logical reasoning abilities
context.additional_context: Learners experiment with various problem-solving rules in a VR environment, track learning records via LMS, and receive iterative feedback

learning_goals: Learners can generate and evaluate at least 3 alternative hypotheses to solve given math problem types.
Learners can compare computational complexity of problem-solving rules in example-based learning environments and select optimal strategies.
Learners can visualize hypothesis verification processes through VR simulations, analyze error patterns, and establish correction strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
